imdb.plot outline: Should love help or hinder what you want to achieve in life? Hsiao Ching (Chloe Wang) is a rising actress who is dating Wang Shao-Chiang (Chieh-kai Shiou), an architect. Although Shao-Chiang wants to marry Hsiao Ching, her parents aren't impressed with him and think she can do better. Chang Chia-Ming (Patrick Pei-hsu Lee), the owner of a luxury resort, may be exactly what Hsiao Ching needs to take her celebrity to the next level, and she risks her relationship with Shao-Chiang by becoming physical with Chia-Ming.
imdb.title: Constellation Women Series: Aries Woman
plot: Should love help or hinder what you want to achieve in life? Hsiao Ching ('Chloe Wang' (qv)) is a rising actress who is dating Wang Shao-Chiang ('Chieh-kai Shiou' (qv)), an architect. Although Shao-Chiang wants to marry Hsiao Ching, her parents aren't impressed with him and think she can do better. Chang Chia-Ming ('Patrick Pei-hsu Lee' (qv)), the owner of a luxury resort, may be exactly what Hsiao Ching needs to take her celebrity to the next level, and she risks her relationship with Shao-Chiang by becoming physical with Chia-Ming.
